promoherobanner.title: Enroll in the Choice Program and Lock in a Guaranteed Savings!

applepromotionconten.description: *Price and Visa Reward Card offers are available to new residential customers who use 1,500 Ccf per year or less, enrolling with Ohio Natural Gas between 3/20/2018 and 4/30/2018 using applicable promotion code; Visa Reward Card offer available only for such customers enrolling online at www.onlyong.com/CHOICE4C. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Customer CHOICE® program through Columbia Gas of Ohio. ONG rates do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.800.970.3146, write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit onlyong.com. For Variable Offer, ONG will guarantee a rate of at least $.05 per Ccf lower than the SCO rate established each month by Columbia Gas of Ohio for your consumption billed through December 31, 2018; for each month during the term of this Variable Offer, customer will be charged the lesser of this guaranteed rate and ONG's Variable Plan at the standard price in effect at that time. Variable Offer price for April 2018 is $0.xxx/Ccf. Variable Offer price may change or remain the same each month based on the applicable month's SCO rate and market conditions. After December 31, 2018, customer will continue to receive service on a month-to-month basis on ONG's Variable Plan at the standard price in effect at that time. Customer must have continuous active service with Ohio Natural Gas for at least 60 days to be eligible to receive the reward card. After reaching eligibility, please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and is subject to the issuer's terms and conditions. Reward Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. All trademarks noted herein are held by their respective owners. Cannot be combined with any other offer.
applepromotionconten.heading: Guaranteed to be at Least 5¢ below the SCO rate through 12/31/2018. Special Bonus: Enroll online and receive a {{giftCardValue | currency:"$":0}} Visa® Reward Card!*
